title: Ros Atkins on... questions that remain for Djokovic
description: The world number one made it onto a tennis court in Melbourne, but he could still be deported.

title: FA Cup Highlights: Manchester United 1-0 Aston Villa
description: Manchester United makes it through to the fourth round in the FA Cup as Scott McTominay's early header seals a 1-0 win over Aston Villa at Old Trafford.

title: PTSD: Ex-soldier builds castle as mental health rehab space
description: Mike Allen created the space as a "coping mechanism" and to help others with mental health issues.

title: FA Cup: BBC pundits discuss why Aston Villa's goal against Manchester United was disallowed
description: Aston Villa lose to Manchester United after a disallowed goal by VAR, Gary Lineker, Alan Shearer and Micah Richards explain why the goal was ruled out.

title: Near-miss for pilot saved from downed plane hit by train
description: Dramatic video shows the rescue, moments before collision, after a plane landed on train tracks.

title: Covid: Fact-checking the doctor who challenged the health secretary
description: An intensive-care doctor challenged the health secretary over mandatory vaccination - are his claims right?

title: The 90-year-old St Annes podcaster with a global audience
description: Doreen Connolly's series was only meant for her family but is reaching listeners in 27 countries.

title: Barry Bennell: Men lose case against Manchester City over abuse
description: Eight men said they were abused by paedophile Barry Bennell while he was a Manchester City scout.

title: Cladding: Developers told to act on lower-height buildings
description: Developers who do not remove cladding on buildings 11-18m high could face legal action, the government says.

title: Past seven years hottest on record - EU satellite data
description: Analysis shows 2021 was the fifth-warmest with record-breaking temperatures in some regions.

title: Virgin Mobile and O2 users will not face EU roaming charges
description: Virgin Media O2 says it will not reintroduce fees for mobile data use and calls in EU countries.

title: Novak Djokovic: Judge orders immediate release of tennis star
description: Anthony Kelly quashes the decision to cancel the player's Australian visa on Covid vaccination grounds.

title: Michael Gove misses interview slot after getting stuck in BBC lift
description: The levelling up secretary misses his slot on the Today programme after half an hour in an elevator.

title: Covid-19: Common cold may give some protection, study suggests
description: Researchers say immune cells made to defend the body against some colds could help stave off Covid.

title: Novak Djokovic: Why world number one is such a polarising player
description: Novak Djokovic's vaccine exemption situation before the Australian Open is the latest controversy for one of tennis' greatest but most polarising players.

title: Mobile roaming charges in Europe: What you need to know
description: How much more will Britons have to pay to use their mobiles in Europe, now the UK has left the EU?

title: The Papers: 'Living with Covid' plan and 5 day isolation support
description: Several of Monday's papers carry reports on how the UK might navigate the next phase of the pandemic.

title: Aung San Suu Kyi: Ousted Myanmar leader jailed for another four years
description: Myanmar's former leader faces a series of charges since being ousted in an army coup last February.

title: Queen's Platinum Jubilee: Celebration plans unveiled by Buckingham Palace
description: Puddings, parties and pageantry as well as a four-day bank holiday weekend will mark her 70-year reign.

title: Raiders, Steelers & 49ers reach play-offs after overtime wins - how NFL's dramatic final day unfolded
description: The Las Vegas Raiders, Pittsburgh Steelers and San Francisco 49ers earn the last three play-offs spots after a dramatic final day of the NFL regular season.

title: Golden Globes: West Side Story and The Power of the Dog win at troubled event
description: Steven Spielberg's remake of the classic film was among the big winners at Sunday's event in LA.

title: Ichthyosaur: Huge fossilised ‘sea dragon’ found in Rutland reservoir
description: The creature lived more than 90 million years ago and its remains were found poking out of the mud.

title: 'They looted everything': Counting the cost of Kazakh protests
description: Violent protests have left Kazakhstan stunned and angry, the BBC's Abdujalil Abdurasulov finds.

title: Bob Saget: US actor and comedian found dead aged 65
description: The Full House star was found dead in his hotel room in Orlando, where he was on tour, police say.

title: Calls to male sexual abuse helpline double in 2021
description: Demand for support through a helpline for male survivors of sexual abuse grew by 110% last year.

title: Paralympic swimmer Will Perry 'sick to death' of dwarfism abuse
description: A Paralympic swimmer calls for people's support to end the ridiculing of people with dwarfism.

title: Cost of living means I can only heat one room
description: "Fuel prices have increased, food prices have increased, rents have increased," says a retired teacher.

title: Gloucestershire course helps ex-offenders start fitness career
description: A college is helping former offenders and recovering addicts achieve qualifications in the fitness industry.

title: Air pollution: Delhi's smog problem is rooted in India's water crisis
description: Years of ill-conceived farming practices have contributed to India's worsening air pollution.

title: The AI software that could turn you in to a music star
description: Artificial intelligence is now smart enough to write tracks that earn streaming service royalties.

title: Covid in schools: 'Fresh air will help stop the spread'
description: Classroom windows are open this winter in line with Covid advice to keep England's schools ventilated.
